questions.question: What is a family?
questions.answer: A family is a group of people who live together.

questions.question: What is a home?
questions.answer: A home is the place where we live with our family.

questions.question: What is a small family?
questions.answer: A small family has parents and children.

questions.question: What is a joint family?
questions.answer: A joint family has parents, grandparents and other relatives living together.

questions.question: Name two members of your family.
questions.answer: My mother and father are members of my family.

questions.question: Who takes care of you at home?
questions.answer: My parents take care of me.

questions.question: Why should we love our family?
questions.answer: Our family loves and cares for us.

questions.question: What should children do at home?
questions.answer: Children should help parents and follow rules.

questions.question: Why should we keep our home clean?
questions.answer: A clean home keeps us healthy.

questions.question: Name one room in your house.
questions.answer: Bedroom is one room in my house.

questions.question: Which room is used for cooking?
questions.answer: The kitchen is used for cooking.

questions.question: Why should we respect elders?
questions.answer: Elders guide and care for us.

questions.question: What makes a home happy?
questions.answer: Love and care make a home happy.

questions.question: Why do we feel safe at home?
questions.answer: Our family protects and cares for us.

questions.question: How can we help our family?
questions.answer: We can help by doing small household work.
